this_title: What Could Possibly Go Wrong? Season 2
trans_title: 不乱搞实验室 第二季
introduction: Kevin and Grant return to decipher what went wrong in the most outrageous videos and then attempt to recreate each experiment using science and a little creativity. From modifying a go-kart to beat a truck in a drag race, building a radio controlled bowling ball that can bowl a strike at will, and finding the fastest way to chill a drink in under a minute.S2 E1 - Game of DronesS2 E2 - Monster Truck Golf CartS2 E3 - Quake, Rattle, and RollS2 E4 - Quicksand QuagmireS2 E5 - Raiders of the Lost KegS2 E6 - Armored Car CombatS2 E7 - Motorcycle ChariotsS2 E8 - Rock 'Em Sock 'Em RevengeS2 E9 - USS Scrapyard SubmarineS2 E10 - Kingpins of ChaosProduction company: [Hoff Productions](https://www.hoff.tv/portfolio/what-could-possibly-go-wrong/)
chinese_title: 不乱搞实验室 第二季
foreign_title: What Could Possibly Go Wrong? Season 2
